DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapy Clinical Trial Total Course Administered Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The total number of single rounds of medication/treatment treatment that was administered before protocol therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Concomitant Medication Domain Prior Therapy Clinical Trial Total Course Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration._An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration.

Property.preferredName: Prior Therapy Clinical Trial Total Course Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator that a person has been previously treated for the same condition or with the same therapy.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Prior action or administration of therapeutic agents that produced an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 62590 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
